When to use Instrumental:: 1. With certain verbs such as "Być" (to be) – Used to describe someone's profession, role, identity, or a state of being.

When to use Instrumental:: 2. To Indicate use of a Tool or Instrument - Used to describe what tool or means is being used to perform an action.

When to use Instrumental:: 3. With Prepositions Requiring Instrumental – z , nad, pod, między

Poszliśmy z kolegami na spacer - We went for a walk with colleagues
